Then, extrude the sketch with a depth of 0.015 towards the normal and no extrusion in the opposite direction. Use a sketch scale of 0.75. This is the first part of the assembly and it will form the base part for subsequent parts. The height of this part is 0.015, the width is 0.75, and the length is also 0.75.</description>
